sections.text: (1) Except as provided in subsection (b), any action --
injury to real or personal property, or
for contribution or indemnity which is brought as a result of such injury or death,
For purposes of this subsection, an improvement to real property shall be considered substantially completed when --
it is first available for use after having been completed in accordance with the contract or agreement covering the improvement, including any agreed changes to the contract or agreement,
The limitation of actions prescribed in subsection (a) shall not apply to --
any action based on a contract, express or implied, or

any action brought against the person who, at the time the defective or unsafe condition of the improvement to real property caused injury or death, was the owner of or in actual possession or control of such real property, or
any manufacturer or supplier of any equipment or machinery or other articles installed in a structure upon real property, or
any action brought by the District of Columbia government.

heading.catch_text: Actions arising out of death or injury caused by defective or unsafe improvements to real property.
